title: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be shown even when dataset is not set
OB: When a table report item is created without setting the dataset, an error is shown.
EB: As per the template requirements, the UI should not perform validation. Therefore, the group dialog should still be shown even when the dataset is not set.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Add a table report item.
2. Do not set the dataset.
3. Try creating a new table group.
